name: Mecha Phantom Beast Auroradon
desc:
2+ Machine monsters
If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 3 "Mecha Phantom Beast Tokens" (Machine/WIND/Level 3/ATK 0/DEF 0), also you cannot Link Summon for the rest of this turn. Once per turn: You can Tribute up to 3 monsters; apply the appropriate effect.
● 1: Destroy 1 card on the field.
● 2: Special Summon 1 "Mecha Phantom Beast" monster from your Deck.
● 3: Add 1 Trap from your GY to your hand.
str5: 2: Special Summon 1 "Mecha Phantom Beast" monster from your Deck
str6: 3: Add 1 Trap from your GY to your hand
